intersectionScalar

public double intersectionScalar(FSegment seg)
Parameters:
seg -
Returns:
Scalar lambda so that the intersection point would be P = a + lambda * (b - a)

parallelIntersection

public IntersectionPoint parallelIntersection(FSegment seg)
Parameters:
seg -
Returns:
An IntersectionPoint or null if the segments are not collinear.

intersection

public IntersectionPoint intersection(FSegment seg)
There exists an intersection point if both segments are NOT parallel.

Parameters:
seg -
Returns:
'e': coolinearly overlap, sharing a point. 'v': An endpoint of one segment is on the other segment but 'e' doesn't hold '1': The segments intersect properly null: The segments don't intersect

between

public boolean between(FPoint p)
Parameters:
p -
Returns:
True if the given point lies on the closed segment. This function assumes it is already known that abc are collinear.

intersects

public boolean intersects(FSegment seg)
Parameters:
seg -
Returns:
True if the given segment intersects this segment.
